PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07632010-06-17EC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Prescribing Circumstances for Granting Waivers Pursuant to Section 147 of the Act
PrecisREGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CIRCUMSTANCES FOR GRANTING WAIVERS PURSUANT TO SECTION 147 OF THE ACT which allows the Minister of the Environment to grant temporary waivers under the authority of CEPA 1999 if there is an actual or anticipated fuel supply shortage during a declared emergency, and/or at the request of the Minister of National Defence if there is an actual or anticipated fuel shortage that could affect national defence operations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0138 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Prescribing Circumstances for Granting Waivers Pursuant to Section 147 of the Act
precis: REGULATIONS PRESCRIBING CIRCUMSTANCES FOR GRANTING WAIVERS PURSUANT TO SECTION 147 OF THE ACT which allows the Minister of the Environment to grant temporary waivers under the authority of CEPA 1999 if there is an actual or anticipated fuel supply shortage during a declared emergency, and/or at the request of the Minister of National Defence if there is an actual or anticipated fuel shortage that could affect national defence operations.
